Matches: In the case of CSN3, the complete loss of function of CSN5 results in the accumulation of a larger and possibly modified CSN3 form, whereas the normal (smaller) CSN3 form is present predominantly in wild type.

Matches: At the vegetative stage, the csn5a plantlets are characterized by small, light green, and curly rosettes (12 and 14DAG), which are almost completely depleted of trichomes, in contrast with wild-type.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Mutants are not lethal at the seedling stage, and, at a few DAG, the purple cotyledons turn light green before the production of true leaves.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Seedlings have purple cotyledons.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Shorter hypocotyls in the dark, shorter roots, smaller flowers, a decreased number of root hairs in response to jasmonic acid treatment, and altered light and auxin responses.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: The cellular pools of the COP9 signalosome complex subunits: CSN1, CSN3, CSN5, CSN6, CSN7, and CSN8, are reduced drastically compared with those in wild type.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Csn5a-1 and csn5a-2 are virtually indistinguishable from each other in the initial few DAG, starting from 8 DAG and throughout the vegetative stage, the phenotype of csn5a-2 is less severe than that of csn5a-1, in terms of both rosette size and trichome density.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: This difference becomes particularly evident at the reproductive phase (52 DAG).

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Double null homozygous mutant progeny invariably die at the seedling stage, do not express detectable CSN5 proteins, and are virtually identical to the null alleles of the cop/det/fus mutants.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: During the first two to three DAG, the double homozygous mutant progeny display the typical photomorphogenic phenotype of the fusca mutants.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: In double homozygous progeny, significant reduction of CSN1, CSN6, CSN7, and CSN8 and in a very slight reduction of CSN4.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: In the case of CSN3, the complete loss of function of CSN5 results in the accumulation of a larger and possibly modified CSN3 form, whereas the normal (smaller) CSN3 form is present predominantly in wild type.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Mutation is lethal in the homozygous state.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: A residual derubylation activity can be observed in the double mutant seedlings.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: At 6 to 7 DAG, the double mutants uniformly start to form the first pair of true leaves and eventually develop into impaired small plantlets, with dark red cotyledons and asymmetrical leaves.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: None of the double mutants arrest at the seedling stage, and even though severely compromised, mutant plantlets survive to a mature stage.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Synergistic phenotype: de-etiolated, fusca seedlings.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Dark grown plants undergo photomorphogenesis.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Mutants are virtually indistinguishable from wild-type siblings in the dark and in all light conditions, both at seedling and mature stages.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Significant increase (five- to sixfold) in the total amount of CSN5 with respect to the CSN5 level observed in the csn5a-2 single mutant.

Query: Purple aleurone.
Matches: The rpn12a-1 mutant has defects in ubiquitin-mediated proteolysis via the 26S proteasome, rendering it more sensitive to misfolded proteins that are degraded in a 26S-proteasome / Ub-dependent manner.

Query: Purple aleurone.
Matches: However, it has increased levels of the 20S core particle of the proteasome, and exhibits reduced sensitivity to oxidative stress, presumably since oxidatively damaged proteins can be degraded in a 20S proteasome-dependent, but 26S proteasome /Ub-independent manner.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Compared with wild-type seedlings, higher percentages of pil5 mutant seedlings grew flat in the dark, i.e., inhibition of hypocotyl negative gravitropism was observed in the dark in the pil5 mutant.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Shorter hypocotyls than either single mutant.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: Irrespective of the light conditions, a reduction of the expression levels of two DELLA genes, GAI and RGA, was measured in this double mutant.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: The double mutant germinates almost 100% in response to even 5 &mu.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: MGA3, irrespective of light conditions.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: When grown under red light, double mutants had a short hypocotyl length similar to that of the pif3 single mutant, whereas the pil5 pif3 double mutant grown under far-red light had short hypocotyl length similar to that of the pil5 single mutant.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.

Query: Anthocyanin color with A1 A2 C1 C2 R1 -PLUS- Pr1 Bz1 and Bz2.
Matches: When treated with a short pulse of far-red light after seed surface sterilization, double mutant seeds germinated, while majority of wild-type seeds did not.

Query: Red aleurone.

Query: Red aleurone.
Matches: Increased cytokinin inhibition of root elongation but intermediate between arr3,4,5,6 and the wild type.

Query: Red aleurone.
Matches: Intermediate cytokinin sensitivity between the wild type and arr3,4,5,6, arr5,6,8,9 and arr3,4,8,9 quadruple mutants in seedling lateral root formation.

Query: Red aleurone.
Matches: The elongated petioles of arr4 and arr3,4 are enhanced, but the overall rosette size is similar to that of the wild-type parent.

Query: Red aleurone.
Matches: The increased petiole elongation suggests that although ARR5 and ARR6 may act antagonistically to each other in regulating rosette size, as a pair they still function additively with ARR3 and ARR4 in the regulation of petiole elongation.
